W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_DETAIL.text: This is the headquarters of those who lead the Flame Tribe both spiritually and politically.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_RUINS_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_RUINS_DETAIL.text: The Flame Temple has been destroyed.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_DETAIL.text: This is the headquarters of those who lead the Forest Tribe both spiritually and politically.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_RUINS_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_RUINS_DETAIL.text: The Forest Temple has been destroyed.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_DETAIL.text: This is the headquarters of those who lead the Gale Tribe both spiritually and politically.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_RUINS_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_RUINS_DETAIL.text: The Gale Temple has been destroyed.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_DETAIL.text: This is the headquarters of those who lead the Wave Tribe both spiritually and politically.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_RUINS_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_RUINS_DETAIL.text: The Wave Temple has been destroyed.

W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLESOUL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_TEMPLESOUL_DETAIL.text: Long ago, the four tribes joined forces to destroy the Soul Temple.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_CONS_DETA.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_CONS_DETA.text: There seems to be a problem at the steam plant.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_DETAIL.text: This steam plant is a symbol of the alliance between the Flame and Wave Tribes. It combines the heat of a volcano with plentiful water to create energy.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_DESTR_DET.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_DESTR_DET.text: A steam plant once stood here.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION142_SHIPYARD_CONS_D.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION142_SHIPYARD_CONS_D.text: You'll need more ships to develop the economy and improve marine transport.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION142_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION142_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.text: The shipyard was completed despite many attempts to stop its construction.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION143_STATION_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION143_STATION_DETAIL.text: A station used by the Forestgale Alliance for trade.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_CONS_DE.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_CONS_DE.text: There seems to be a problem at the lumber mill construction site.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_DETAIL.text: This mill turns the resources of the vast forest into lumber of various sizes.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_DESTR_D.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_DESTR_D.text: No one would ever guess this used to be a lumber mill.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_CONS_DE.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_CONS_DE.text: The wind farm's construction is experiencing some problems.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_DETAIL.text: This wind farm was completed through the combined efforts of the Gale and Forest Tribes, and stands as a symbol of their cooperation.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_DESTR_D.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_DESTR_D.text: The only thing here now is the lonely sound of the wind rushing over a pile of rubble.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION233_HARBOR_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION233_HARBOR_DETAIL.text: A port used by the Flamewave League for trade.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION233_HARBOR_DESTR_DE.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION233_HARBOR_DESTR_DE.text: Only sunken vessels remain here now.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION101_STEAM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION101_STEAM_DETAIL.text: This steam plant is a symbol of the alliance between the Flame and Wave Tribes. It combines the heat of a volcano with plentiful water to create energy.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION101_STEAM_IMPROVED_.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION101_STEAM_IMPROVED_.text: The steam plant now produces more energy than ever before.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION102_FORGE_CONS_DETA.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION102_FORGE_CONS_DETA.text: It won't be easy to construct an ironworks in this scorching region.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION102_FORGE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION102_FORGE_DETAIL.text: These ironworks are capable of producing various metal goodsâ€”including weapons.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION201_SAWMILL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION201_SAWMILL_DETAIL.text: This mill turns the resources of the vast forest into lumber of various sizes.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION201_SAWMILL_IMPROVE.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION201_SAWMILL_IMPROVE.text: The work here is increasingly automated, allowing lumber to be manufactured more efficiently with fewer people.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION202_STABBLE_CONS_DE.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION202_STABBLE_CONS_DE.text: Work is ongoing on stables used for the raising and training of military horses.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION202_STABBLE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION202_STABBLE_DETAIL.text: The ability to fight on horseback will be a valuable asset to the Forest Tribe.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION301_WINDTUR_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION301_WINDTUR_DETAIL.text: This wind farm was completed through the combined efforts of the Wave and Forest Tribes, and stands as a symbol of their cooperation.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION301_WINDTUR_IMPROVE.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION301_WINDTUR_IMPROVE.text: The wind farm can now produce more energy than ever before.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION302_FARM_CONS_DETAI.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION302_FARM_CONS_DETAI.text: Work is ongoing to construct barns that will improve people's food-related self-sufficiency.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION302_FARM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION302_FARM_DETAIL.text: This is a lively location where various animals are raised.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION401_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION401_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.text: Laborers are hard at work here, but they still aren't able to fully utilize some facilities.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION401_SHIPYARD_IMPROV.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION401_SHIPYARD_IMPROV.text: The newly upgraded shipyard can manufacture new and larger ships more efficiently.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION402_LIHOUSE_CONS_DE.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION402_LIHOUSE_CONS_DE.text: Work is ongoing to construct a lighthouse that will improve the safety of sea voyages.

W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION402_LIHOUSE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_LTXT_COMM_MISSION402_LIHOUSE_DETAIL.text: The lighthouse's guiding beacon makes for smoother sea traffic in this area.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_PHASE1_INTRO_00.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_PHASE1_INTRO_00.text: You thought the people of the Flame Temple had no interest in you, yet you're being pointed towards them nonetheless.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_PHASE1_INTRO_00.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_PHASE1_INTRO_00.text: You thought the people of the Forest Temple had no interest in you, yet you're being pointed towards them nonetheless.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_PHASE1_INTRO_00.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_PHASE1_INTRO_00.text: You thought the people of the Gale Temple had no interest in you, yet you're being pointed towards them nonetheless.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_PHASE1_INTRO_0.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_PHASE1_INTRO_0.text: You thought the people of the Wave Temple had no interest in you, yet you're being pointed towards them nonetheless.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_PHASE1_INTRO_00.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_PHASE1_INTRO_00.text: Perhaps you should hear what the people of the Flame Temple have to say.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_PHASE1_INTRO_00.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_PHASE1_INTRO_00.text: Perhaps you should hear what the people of the Forest Temple have to say.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_PHASE1_INTRO_00.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_PHASE1_INTRO_00.text: Perhaps you should hear what the people of the Gale Temple have to say.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_PHASE1_INTRO_0.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_PHASE1_INTRO_0.text: Perhaps you should hear what the people of the Wave Temple have to say.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_PHASE2_BETRAYAL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_PHASE2_BETRAYAL.text: The conflict is over, yet you find yourself being led to the Flame Temple once more.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_PHASE2_BETRAYAL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_PHASE2_BETRAYAL.text: The conflict is over, yet you find yourself being led to the Forest Temple once more.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_PHASE2_BETRAYAL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_PHASE2_BETRAYAL.text: The conflict is over, yet you find yourself being led to the Gale Temple once more.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_PHASE2_BETRAYA.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_PHASE2_BETRAYA.text: The conflict is over, yet you find yourself being led to the Wave Temple once more.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_DETAIL.text: The Flame Temple seeks your aid.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_DETAIL.text: The Forest Temple seeks your aid.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_DETAIL.text: The Gale Temple seeks your aid.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_DETAIL.text: The Wave Temple seeks your aid.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_GAMEOVER_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEFIRE_GAMEOVER_DETAIL.text: The fighting is finally over, and the Flame Temple emerged victorious.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_GAMEOVER_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWOOD_GAMEOVER_DETAIL.text: The fighting is finally over, and the Forest Temple emerged victorious.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_GAMEOVER_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWIND_GAMEOVER_DETAIL.text: The fighting is finally over, and the Gale Temple emerged victorious.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_GAMEOVER_DETAI.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLEWATER_GAMEOVER_DETAI.text: The fighting is finally over, and the Wave Temple emerged victorious.

W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLESOUL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_TEMPLESOUL_DETAIL.text: These ruins contain a portal that leads out of this world.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION141_STEAM_DETAIL.text: The construction of the steam plant is running into problems.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION142_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION142_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.text: You'll need more ships to develop the economy and improve marine transport.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION143_STATION_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION143_STATION_DETAIL.text: This train station is key to the economy of the Forestgale Alliance.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION231_SAWMILL_DETAIL.text: There is a pressing need to construct a lumber mill that makes use of the forest's plentiful resources.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION232_WINDTUR_DETAIL.text: If you can harvest energy from the wind, it will solve the Forestgale Alliance's energy problems.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION233_HARBOR_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION233_HARBOR_DETAIL.text: Will the plan to destroy the port go ahead?

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION101_STEAM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION101_STEAM_DETAIL.text: The process of upgrading the steam plant isn't proceeding according to schedule.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION102_FORGE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION102_FORGE_DETAIL.text: Building an ironworks in a volcanic area won't be without its challenges.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION103_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION103_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.text: The construction of the shipyard required so much hard work. Are you really going to destroy it?

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION201_SAWMILL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION201_SAWMILL_DETAIL.text: The process of upgrading the lumber mill isn't proceeding according to schedule.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION202_STABBLE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION202_STABBLE_DETAIL.text: You expect the Gale Tribe to interfere with the stables' construction.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION203_WINDTUR_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION203_WINDTUR_DETAIL.text: You worked so hard to defend the wind farm. Are you really going to destroy it?

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION301_WINDTUR_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION301_WINDTUR_DETAIL.text: You expect to face obstacles while upgrading the wind farm.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION302_FARM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION302_FARM_DETAIL.text: The construction of the barns is going well...so far.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION303_SAWMILL_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION303_SAWMILL_DETAIL.text: The Forest and Gale Tribes worked together to construct this lumber mill. Are you really going to destroy it?

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION401_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION401_SHIPYARD_DETAIL.text: The process of upgrading the shipyard is ready to begin.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION402_LIHOUSE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION402_LIHOUSE_DETAIL.text: Work is ongoing to construct a lighthouse here.

W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION403_STEAM_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_MISSION403_STEAM_DETAIL.text: This steam plant is a source of energy for the Flame and Wave Tribes. Are you really going to destroy it?

W07_EVAR_COMM_FREEBATTLE_DETAIL.speaker: UI
W07_EVAR_COMM_FREEBATTLE_DETAIL.text: If you enter this forest, you'll tangle with the ferocious fiends that call it home. It's a good place to refine your combat skills.
